definition: lit. dressed up animal (idiom)/fig. immoral and despicable person
clothes/CL:件[jian4]/Kangxi radical 145
to dress/to wear/to put on (clothes)
hat/crown/crest/cap
surname Guan
to put on a hat/to be first/to dub
generic term for birds and animals/birds/to capture (old)
beast/animal/beastly/bestial

sentences.english: Animals who are dressed-up. An analogy meaning immoral and despicable people.
sentences.chinese: 你這個衣冠禽獸就知道欺負女人。
他是個冷酷無情的衣冠禽獸。

sentences.english: The well-dressed men of beastly temper are ubiquitous in every where.
sentences.chinese: 注重外表的衣冠禽獸，普天之下到處都是。

sentences.english: You are a beast in human attire, you always bully women.
sentences.chinese: 衣冠禽獸就知道欺負女人。

sentences.english: Her husband was a real beast.

definition: to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
chicken-hearted (idiom)/gutless
crafty/slippery/slyboots
to have no sense of shame/brazen
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
bane of one's existence/vile spawn
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to make a fool of oneself
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
two-faced person/double-dealing
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: to persist in one's views
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4
